name: Sarah's Secrets - Interactive Story
description:
Once upon a time, there was a regular teenage girl… So, obviously, she was going through a lot! Besides her complicated love life, she is absolutely passionate about pets and decides to save them! Sarah needs your help with her life decisions!

Help Sarah fundraising to save the local animal shelter AND manage her troubled and very busy love life. Will she fall in love with Thomas, the helpful son of the local vet? Or will she have a crush on Mark, the charming and mysterious boy from school? Maybe she will end up dating Ted, the sweet and shy friend? So many options… So many decisions to make… Don’t miss out on her adventures and all this romance!

In this amazing narrative game, you will be the master of Sarah’s destiny and will help her follow the path towards her fate, along with her BFF Patty!

HIGHLIGHTS
• Enjoy the fame: the number of your blog’s followers will change depending on the decisions you make for Sarah.
• Find out all Sarah’s secrets! Only you will know them all! And her BFF, obviously...
• Totally new dynamic approach of interactiveness.
• Make decisions for other characters too and change their lives!
• NO REGRETS! Take some steps back and change the story anytime you want! Can you unravel all the possible endings for Sarah’s story?
• Days and days of posts with loads of funny and amazing moments!
• Beautifully illustrated!

Disclaimer: While this App is completely free to play, some additional content can be purchased for real money in-game. If you do not want to use this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.
